title: Behind the Wheel with MotorTrend
overview: "Behind the Wheel" on MotorTrend is your go-to show for in-depth new-car reviews. Our hosts Jonny Lieberman, Kristen Lee and Joe Berry take you on exhilarating rides in the year's most notable vehicles. Experience candid, unfiltered opinions on the latest cars, trucks and SUVs from industry experts. Get ready to hit the road with us for an honest look at what's driving the automotive industry.
